extended_metaphor.metaphor: both Jet Stream in polar vortex and Repulsor technology in Iron Man have a dynamic boundary that creates a separation between two different regions, influencing the behavior and distribution of atmospheric phenomena
extended_metaphor.jet_stream: The Jet Stream acts as a dynamic boundary in the atmosphere, separating cold polar air from warmer air at lower latitudes. This boundary influences the movement of weather systems and helps in distributing energy across different regions.
extended_metaphor.repulsor_technology: Similarly, Repulsor technology in Iron Man creates a dynamic boundary that separates Tony Stark from external threats. This technology influences the behavior of energy and momentum around Iron Man, aiding in his movement and control during battles.

extended_metaphor.metaphor: both Jet Stream in polar vortex and Repulsor technology in Iron Man concentrate energy and momentum for efficient transport across large distances
extended_metaphor.jet_stream: The Jet Stream concentrates energy and momentum within the atmosphere, allowing for the efficient transport of these factors across vast distances. This concentration drives the movement of weather systems and supports the regulation of global weather patterns.
extended_metaphor.repulsor_technology: Similarly, Repulsor technology in Iron Man concentrates energy and momentum to power his suit and weapons efficiently. This concentration aids Iron Man in flying long distances and engaging in battles with precision and speed.

extended_metaphor.metaphor: both Jet Stream in polar vortex and Repulsor technology in Iron Man form high winds along boundaries, contributing to the concentrated structure that regulates global weather patterns
extended_metaphor.jet_stream: High winds form along the boundaries created by the Jet Stream, contributing to the concentrated structure that enables the regulation of weather patterns globally. These high winds play a crucial role in transporting energy and shaping weather systems.
extended_metaphor.repulsor_technology: Similarly, Repulsor technology in Iron Man generates high winds or energy streams as a byproduct of its operation. These high winds help Iron Man in maneuvering swiftly and enhancing the impact of his attacks, contributing to the dynamic and controlled nature of his battles.
